page.title: 05Activities in Warton
page.content: Besides church, a new Village Hall, once a malt kiln, is the centre for a Youth Club, Leisure Club, Village Society, a Ballet & Tap Dancing School, Adult Education, plays, concerts and Badminton. Long established groups include the Lifeboat Society, Drama Group, Cricket Club, Bowls Club, Womens'Institute,Pensioners, and the Horticultural Society having its 41st. annual show with 125 competitions at 5p per entry. 1985 also sees a new branch of Save The Children Fund, a first book by the Historical Society, and an Art Group's first exhibition. Playgroup for under fives uses the Church Hall and School. There are also groups in Dressmaking, Flower Arranging and Yoga. Horse riding is again a familiar sight with the coming of a Hunter Livery Yard cum Riding School.
